channel.title: math.GN updates on arXiv.org
channel.description: math.GN updates on the arXiv.org e-print archive.

item.title: The complexity of classifying continuous t-norms up to isomorphism
item.description: arXiv:2408.16456v2 Announce Type: replace-cross Abstract: It is shown that the isomorphism relation between continuous t-norms is Borel bireducible with the relation of order isomorphism between linear orders on the set of natural numbers, and therefore, it is a Borel complete equivalence relation.
item.dc:creator: Jialiang He, Lili Shen, Yi Zhou
